label: Population density
unit: People per square kilometre

label: Population
unit: Resident population

label: Employment rate
unit: Percentage of people aged 16-64 in work

label: Female life expectancy
unit: Average female life expectancy at birth

label: Male healthy life expectancy
unit: Average male healthy life expectancy

label: Gross disposable household income
unit: Per capita disposable income

label: Gross value added per hour worked
Internet access
unit: Percentage of the population with access to the internet

label: No qualifications rate
unit: Percentage of the population aged 16-64 without qualifications

label: Unemployment rate
unit: Percentage of workers unemployment while seeking work

label: Travel time to nearest employment centre by public transport
unit: Average time taken to travel to employment centre with 500-4,999 jobs using public transport

label: Travel time to nearest employment centre by car
unit: Average time taken to travel to employment centre with 500-4,999 jobs by car

label: Travel time to nearest employment centre by cycle
unit: Average time taken to travel to employment centre with 500-4,999 jobs by cycle

label: Broadband speed
unit: Percentage of premises where broadband speed is over 125 megabytes

label: 4G coverage
unit: Percentage of area with 4G signal from at least one operator

label: Primary school attainment
unit: Percentage of pupils in state-funded schools meeting expected standards in reading, writing and maths by the end of primary school

label: GCSE attainment
unit: Percentage of pupils achieiving GCSEs (and equivalent) in England and Maths by age 19

label: Ofsted ratings
unit: Percentage of schools and nurserys rated 'Good' or 'Outstanding' by Ofsted

label: Pupil absences
unit: Percentage of pupils in state-funded schools with an absence rate above 10%

label: Free-school-meal pupil absences
unit: Percentage of pupils eligible for free school meals in state-funded schools with an absence rate above 10%

label: Early learning language and communication attainment
unit: Percentage of 5-year-olds at the 'expected level' for communication and language early-learning goals

label: Early learning literacy attainment
unit: Percentage of 5-year-olds at the 'expected level' for literacy early-learning goals

label: Early learning maths attainment
unit: Percentage of 5-year-olds at the 'expected level' for maths early-learning goals

label: Apprenticeship starts
unit: Apprenticeships started by adults aged 16 and over per 100,000 people

label: Further education participation rate
unit: 19+ further education and skills participation per 100,000 people

label: Cigarette smokers
unit: Percentage of adults stating they smoke cigarettes

label: Early years overweight rate
unit: Percentage of 4- and 5-year-olds classified as overweight

label: Child overweight rate
unit: Percentage of 10- and 11-year-olds classified as overweight

label: Adult overweight rate
unit: Percentage of adults classified as overweight

label: Stage 1 and 2 cancer diagnoses
unit: Percentage of cancer cases diagnosed at stages 1 and 2

label: Life satisfaction
unit: Average adult subjective rating of life satisfaction

label: Feeling that life is worthwhile
unit: Average adult subjective rating that they feel their life is worthwhile

label: Anxiety
unit: Average adult subjective rating of anxiety

label: Additions to the housing stock
unit: Net additions to the dwelling stock per 1,000 existing dwellings

label: Female healthy life expectancy
unit: Average female healthy life expectancy
